description:
Honey won`t stop until every member of Panther Claw pays for what happened but, despite her rage, she welcomes some unexpected guests.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Anata no Omoiyari, Hagemashi ni Kansha Shimasu
Danke für deine Sympathie und Ermutigung
Thank You for Your Compassion and Encouragement
あなたの思いやり, 励ましに感謝します
